name: Cardcannon
description:
Cardcannon is a strategic card game based on Gridcannon by Tom Francis. Use your grid of cards to kill the royals and win the game! Cardcannon aims to be a more strategic spin on the original, using the benefit of being digital to its fullest advantage.

Extra Fancy Features
  • Multiplayer: In addition to normal singleplayer mode, included is a competitive multiplayer variant which supports up to 8 players including the host.
  • Demo/Saves: Demo playback is included which can play back any game you have previously completed. This works in both multiplayer and singleplayer and demo/save files can be shared freely!

Extra Notes

  • Lobby host must portforward 27429 (TCP) for multiplayer to work!
  • In multiplayer points are scored based on how many royals are killed, (Jack adds 1 point, Queen adds 2, King adds 3).
  • Score Formula: 100+pointsearned+(5*hp)-ceil(0.5*totalMoves)
